languages.text: "Это элантах держит меня подле себя. Если бы не {mf|он|она}, моя душа уже бы давно покинула это тело. Или же... была поглощена прислужницей Той, Что Жаждет. И я бы никогда не узнала правду о том, что стало с Крударахом".

traits.locale_text: "Это элантах держит меня подле себя. Если бы не {mf|он|она}, моя душа уже бы давно покинула это тело. Или же... была поглощена прислужницей Той, Что Жаждет. И я бы никогда не узнала правду о том, что стало с Крударахом".

languages.text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."
languages.original_text: "Это элантах держит меня подле себя. Если бы не {mf|он|она}, моя душа уже бы давно покинула это тело. Или же... была поглощена прислужницей Той, Что Жаждет. И я бы никогда не узнала правду о том, что стало с Крударахом".

"It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of Her Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

"It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

"It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

"It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

languages.text: «Es {mf|el|la} elantach quien me lleva consigo. De no ser por {mf|él|ella}, mi alma habría abandonado este cuerpo hace mucho. O peor aún... habría sido devorada por un secuaz de la Sedienta. Y entonces jamás había descubierto la verdad sobre lo que ocurrió con Crudarach».
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: «Es {mf|el|la} elantach quien me lleva consigo. De no ser por {mf|él|ella}, mi alma habría abandonado este cuerpo hace mucho. O peor aún... habría sido devorada por un secuaz de la Sedienta. Y entonces jamás había descubierto la verdad sobre lo que ocurrió con Crudarach».

languages.text: 「私を自分側に引き留めているのは星外人だ。その星外人がいなければ、私の魂はとっくにこの肉体を離れていただろう。あるいは…〈かの渇きたる女〉の手先に食われていたであろう。そしてクルダラで起きたことの真実を知ることもなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: 「私を自分側に引き留めているのは星外人だ。その星外人がいなければ、私の魂はとっくにこの肉体を離れていただろう。あるいは…〈かの渇きたる女〉の手先に食われていたであろう。そしてクルダラで起きたことの真実を知ることもなかっただろう」

languages.text: “不是{mf|他|她}陪着我，而是我留在这位外界人身边。如果不是因为{mf|他|她}，我的灵魂恐怕早就离开这具躯壳了。又或者……我会被饥渴女士的仆人吞噬，永远无法得知克鲁达拉赫的真相。”
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: “不是{mf|他|她}陪着我，而是我留在这位外界人身边。如果不是因为{mf|他|她}，我的灵魂恐怕早就离开这具躯壳了。又或者……我会被饥渴女士的仆人吞噬，永远无法得知克鲁达拉赫的真相。”

languages.text: « C'est l'elantach qui me garde à ses côtés. Sans {mf|lui|elle}, mon âme aurait quitté ce corps depuis bien longtemps. Ou alors... j'aurais été dévorée par un serviteur de l'Assoiffée. Et je n'aurais jamais appris la vérité quant au sort de Crudarach. »
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: « C'est l'elantach qui me garde à ses côtés. Sans {mf|lui|elle}, mon âme aurait quitté ce corps depuis bien longtemps. Ou alors... j'aurais été dévorée par un serviteur de l'Assoiffée. Et je n'aurais jamais appris la vérité quant au sort de Crudarach. »

languages.text: "{mf|Der|Die} Elantach ist {mf|derjenige|diejenige}, {mf|der|die} auf mich aufpasst. Ohne {mf|ihn|sie} hätte meine Seele schon lange meinen Körper verlassen. Oder aber ... Ich wäre von einem Lakaien von Ihr, die dürstet, verschlungen worden. Und ich hätte nie erfahren, was mit Crudarach geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der|Die} Elantach ist {mf|derjenige|diejenige}, {mf|der|die} auf mich aufpasst. Ohne {mf|ihn|sie} hätte meine Seele schon lange meinen Körper verlassen. Oder aber ... Ich wäre von einem Lakaien von Ihr, die dürstet, verschlungen worden. Und ich hätte nie erfahren, was mit Crudarach geschehen ist."

languages.text: "Esas ben bu elantacha eşlik ediyorum. O olmasaydı ruhum çoktan bu bedeni terk etmişti. Daha da kötüsü olabilirdi. Susayan'ın yardakçılarından birine kurban gidebilirdim. Öyle bir durumda da Crudarach'a olanlara dair hakikati asla öğrenemezdim."
languages.original_text: "It is the elantach who keeps me at {mf|his|her} side. Were it not for {mf|him|her}, my soul would have long left this body. Or else... I would have been devoured by a minion of She Who Thirsts. And I would never have learned the truth of what happened to Crudarach."

traits.locale_text: "Esas ben bu elantacha eşlik ediyorum. O olmasaydı ruhum çoktan bu bedeni terk etmişti. Daha da kötüsü olabilirdi. Susayan'ın yardakçılarından birine kurban gidebilirdim. Öyle bir durumda da Crudarach'a olanlara dair hakikati asla öğrenemezdim."
